00033 
00034 class Synchronized {
00035 public:
00036   Synchronized() {
00037     m_cs = AI_CreateCriticalSection();
00038     // if it fails...  shit
00039   }
00040 
00041   ~Synchronized() {
00042     AI_DestroyCriticalSection(m_cs);
00043   }
00044 
00045   void Lock() {
00046    
00047     ADR_LOG("--> Trying to lock");
00048     AI_EnterCriticalSection(m_cs);
00049     ADR_LOG("-->:: LOCKED ::");
00050   }
00051 
00052   void Unlock() {
00053     ADR_LOG("<-- Unlocking...");
00054     AI_LeaveCriticalSection(m_cs);
00055   }
00056 
00057 private:
00058   AI_CriticalSection m_cs;
00059 };
00060 
00061 
00062 class AI_Lock {
00063 public:
00064   AI_Lock(Synchronized* object)
00065   : m_object(object) {
00066     object->Lock();
00067   }
00068 
00069   ~AI_Lock() {
00070     m_object->Unlock();
00071   }
00072 
00073 private:
00074   Synchronized* m_object;
00075 };
